examplePhrases: alexa open, GL Bajaj Admission Desk
en-US.name: GL Bajaj Admission Desk
en-US.description:
This skill is designed to assist prospective and current students of GL Bajaj Institute by providing instant answers to frequently asked questions about admissions, hostel facilities, placements, and more. It supports English and Hindi voice interactions. 

“Alexa, open GL Bajaj Info”

“Ask GL Bajaj Info about hostel facilities”

hi-IN.summary: customized to answer parents and student queries in gl bajaj
examplePhrases: Alexa, gl bajaj admission desk शुरू करो
Alexa, open gl bajaj admission desk
